metadata.name: Robot in the Spree-verse #1/22
metadata.description:
Robot in the Spree-verse: a snapshot into the worlds made of everything we can imagine drawing from the music that inspires us to shine.

This 3D digital artwork was created in virtual reality using OpenBrush with audio reactive brush animation. 

The artwork was painted in real time as a collaborative creation with DJ Spree. The performance was a 60 minute live DJ and artist session streamed on 2021-11-26 from the home studio in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

The Robot is part of Linnea Maas (InsideTheRobot)'s creations and can be seen throughout their body of work spanning traditional to digital media.
